snippet.title: Science Festival Alliance helps connect scientists and the public
snippet.description: ...Since our coverage of the San Diego science festival in 2009, science festivals have built momentum... its first festival this month, and San Francisco will join it later in the year. snippet.description: ...Cartoon Networks new MMO, FusionFall, faces the daunting task of providing a quality gameplay... combat/leveling, as well as a story that will most likely appeal to the vast majority of Cartoon Cartoons fans, though, the game is actually surprisingly fun. As embarrassing as it is to admit, Ive...

snippet.title: NSF gives $3 Million for a National Science Festival Network
snippet.description: ...The National Science Foundation (NSF) recently awarded UC San Diego and its partners, the MIT Museum, the Franklin Institute (Philadelphia) and UC San Francisco, $3 million to fund science outreach programs. These include establishing a National Science Festival Network, hosting science enrichment activities, and funding the 2010 San Diego Science Festival.Back in April, we reported the success o...
